name: Spotify Token Service
description: A Spotify Token Swap/Refresh Service for easy deployment to Heroku.

CLIENT_ID.description: Your client id, found in your Spotify App Dashboard.

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Your client secret, found in your Spotify App Dashboard.

ENCRYPTION_SECRET.description: A secret key used to encrypt your token.

CLIENT_CALLBACK_URL.description: The Redirect URI found in your Spotify App Dashboard.
